get.description: Returns a list of actions that backend requires the user to complete before he can start working with Neptune

post.description: Processes the survey. Sending {} means that user declined survey and action is removed

Sets the username as per param.
Can be called once, subsequent calls will result in 403 error.
Setting to an invalid username will result in 400 error.
Setting to an unavailable username will result in 409 error.
